messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Nintendo/was The truth can be subjective
messages.msgSnippet: ... Well, I have decided to give this a real life test, here, and have told my son I will buy him a Nintendo system.  (Still vague about which one.) I did
messages.messageBody:
> or "if I let them play video games
>they'll never stop" it's a good moment to give evidence to the contrary.

Well, I have decided to give this a real life test, here, and have told my
son I will buy him a Nintendo system. (Still vague about which one.)

I did deceive him recently about the tooth fairy.

And... I thought about trying to dissolve the tooth I acquired from him in
Coke, but decided not to bother.

Yes, all this discussion does ripple into our lives, somehow.

Betsy
